snippet.title: Atari 2600 Longplay [086] Planet Patrol (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: RickyC

Actually very impressed with this game. The graphics are great and it's quite fun. The gameplay loop is a bit short though.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
